p:
Table 3 demonstrates the in vitro calculated IC 50 values ( μg/mL) of T. aphylla AE and EE as well as control drugs (cisplatin and doxorubicin). The in vitro cytotoxicity profiles (% cytotoxicity versus concentration) of the control drugs alongside the different tested extracts are shown in Figures 2
– 5. Regarding the EO, the amount obtained by hydrodistillation unfortunately hindered its further biological evaluation due to presence in traces.
